attributes.action: Create a High Speed Rail Network
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An integrated High Speed rail Network of 2 lines north to south: london/East midlands/Yorkshire & London/west Midlands/Lancashire and a line west London/Bristol/Cardiff. would free up existing heritage rail for local and freight use, and also help to negate the requirement for expansion of the road network. Locally an increase in light rail or tram networks is also required.
